dashboard.welcome: Secure the seat and enjoy your journey

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
termsPage.subtitle: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the VeloTick online booking platform and related services. Please read them carefully before proceeding with any booking.

general.title: 1. General Terms
general.welcome: Welcome to TegaBus, the online bus ticket booking platform. By accessing or using our website, mobile applications, or any other services provided by VeloTick (collectively, the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
general.binding: These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement between you and TegaBus regarding your use of the Services. If you do not agree to these Terms and Conditions, you may not access or use the Services.
general.modifications: VeloTick reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Your continued use of the Services following the posting of modified Terms and Conditions means that you accept and agree to the changes.

process.title: 2.1 Booking Process
process.content: To book a ticket through our Services, you must provide accurate and complete information, including valid identification where required. All provided information must match the identification used during travel.

confirmation.title: 2.2 Confirmation
confirmation.content: Upon successful booking and payment, you will receive a booking confirmation via email or SMS. This confirmation serves as your ticket and must be presented during boarding.

seatAllocation.title: 2.3 Seat Allocation
seatAllocation.content: Seat numbers are allocated on a first-come, first-served basis, or as per the bus operator's policy. VeloTick does not guarantee the availability of specific seats unless explicitly stated during the booking process.

ageRequirements.title: 2.4 Age Requirements
ageRequirements.content: Passengers under the age of 18 may be required to travel with an adult. For specific age policies, please refer to the respective bus operator's terms.

methods.title: 3.1 Payment Methods
methods.content: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, net banking, and digital wallets. All payments are processed through secure payment gateways.

currency.title: 3.2 Currency
currency.content: All prices are displayed in the local currency and include applicable taxes and fees unless otherwise stated. Additional bank charges may apply for international transactions.

priceChanges.title: 3.3 Price Changes
priceChanges.content: Ticket prices are subject to change without prior notice. However, once a booking is confirmed and paid for, the price will not be altered.

policy.title: 4.1 Cancellation Policy
policy.content: Tickets may be cancelled through our website or mobile application. Cancellation policies vary by bus operator and route.

refundProcess.title: 4.2 Refund Process
refundProcess.content: Refunds for cancelled tickets are processed according to the applicable cancellation policy. The refund amount depends on the timing of cancellation relative to the departure time.

noShow.title: 4.3 No-Show Policy
noShow.content: If you fail to board the bus at the scheduled departure time without prior cancellation, it will be considered a "no-show" and no refund will be provided.

accountSecurity.title: 5.1 Account Security
accountSecurity.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

accurateInfo.title: 5.2 Accurate Information
accurateInfo.content: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration and booking processes.

prohibited.title: 5.3 Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: You agree not to use our Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of our Services or interfere with the proper working of our platform.

dataCollection.title: 6.1 Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect personal information necessary for providing our Services, including but not limited to name, contact details, and payment information.

dataUsage.title: 6.2 Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your data is used for processing bookings, providing customer support, improving our services, and complying with legal obligations.

dataSecurity.title: 6.3 Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

contact.title: 7. Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact our customer support:

footer.latestTips: For our latest booking tips and tricks
footer.invalidEmail: Enter an email address like example@mysite.com.
footer.subscribeNewsletter: Yes, subscribe me to your newsletter.
footer.companyDescription: Your trusted partner for comfortable and reliable bus travel across the region.

login.title: User Login
login.subtitle: Fill in your credentials to login

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.successMessage: If an account exists for {email}, you'll receive a reset link shortly.

about.pageDescription: Learn about our mission, features, and how we simplify bus travel.

hero.title: Revolutionizing
hero.description: A seamless, centralized platform for booking bus tickets across multiple operators. Passengers can easily find and book bus tickets, view schedules, and track their travel.

hero.title: Terms & Conditions
hero.description: By accessing and booking through our platform, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions.

hero.title: At right place
hero.description: Experience seamless Bus booking with our advanced seat selection platform. Choose your perfect seat and embark on your journey with confidence.

seatSelection.title: Select Your Seats
seatSelection.subtitle: Choose your preferred seats to continue with booking

oneStopBooking.title: One-Stop Booking
oneStopBooking.description: Multiple bus operators in one place.

smartSearch.title: Smart Search
smartSearch.description: Filters for routes, timings, and amenities.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Dedicated help via chat, email, or phone.

generalTerms.title: General Terms
generalTerms.content: All bookings are subject to seat availability and must comply with our policies. Changes may occur without prior notice.

safety.title: Safety and Security
safety.content: Passenger safety is our top priority. Please follow all driver instructions and report any suspicious activity.

booking.title: Booking & Cancellations
booking.content: Bookings are confirmed once payment is received. Cancellations may incur fees based on how early they are made.

routes.title: Bus Routes and Delays
routes.content: Routes are subject to change. Delays may occur due to weather or traffic, but we strive to inform customers promptly.

hero.title: Seamless Ticket Booking with TegaBus
hero.description: Say goodbye to long queues! Book your bus tickets instantly, securely, and hassle-free. Whether you're commuting or traveling long distances, TegaBus makes your journey smoother with just a few clicks.
hero.headline: Book Your Next Journey with Confidence

placeholders.descriptionPlaceholder: Include: 1) Steps to reproduce 2) Expected vs actual behavior 3) Screenshots if applicable

faq.noQuestionsFound: No questions found in this category

questions.systemSetup: How do I set up the system for the first time?
questions.systemSetupAnswer: Navigate to System Settings > Initial Setup. Follow the step-by-step wizard to configure your company details, routes, and payment integration.
questions.addUsers: How to add new admin users with different access levels?
questions.addUsersAnswer: Go to User Management > Add User. Assign roles (Admin, Manager, Cashier) with appropriate permissions. Managers can manage bookings but not system settings.

resources.title: Administrator Resources
resources.completeGuide: Complete guide to all admin features and settings

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch with Us
contact.description: For inquiries, feedback, or assistance, feel free to reach out. We’re here to ensure your travel experience is smooth and enjoyable.

info.description_1: Reserve your seat in seconds with our intuitive platform
info.description_2: Pay with confidence using reliable and safe payment options
info.description_3: Get instant updates on bus schedules and seat availability
